The Chat Enhancer Chrome Extension is here to revolutionize your chat experience on platforms like chat.openai.com. This handy tool adds features such as prompt extraction for easy reference, real-time updates to prompts as you navigate between threads, and seamless integration with the chat interface. Say goodbye to scattered conversations and hello to a more organized and productive chat experience!

With Chat Enhancer, you can effortlessly stay on top of your conversations and focus on what matters most. Try it out today and elevate your chat experience to the next level!
